name: ISNOTNULL
shortDescription: Check if an expression is not NULL
description: Returns True if the expression is not NULL, otherwise returns False.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: Value to check for not NULL

examples.title: Count
examples.sql:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN ISNOTNULL(email) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_emails
FROM users
